input_text:
Job Title: Shipping/Estimation

Location: Smyrna, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Estimation TechnicianCompany: Endotechnologies, LLCLocation: Smyrna, TN
About Us:Endo Technologies, LLC is a leading provider of endoscopy solutions, dedicated to delivering high-quality, innovative products to healthcare professionals worldwide. As a small but rapidly growing business, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and our passion for improving patient outcomes.
Job Description:We are currently seeking a detail-oriented and motivated Estimation Technician to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for evaluating endoscopes to determine repair needs and providing accurate estimations for repair costs. The ideal candidate will possess strong technical skills, exceptional attention to detail, and a commitment to delivering outstanding service to our customers.
Responsibilities:Inspect and evaluate endoscopes to identify repair needs and determine the extent of damage or malfunction.Accurately estimate repair costs based on evaluation findings and company pricing guidelines.Communicate effectively with customers to provide repair estimates and address any questions or concerns.Document evaluation findings, repair estimates, and customer interactions in our internal systems.Collaborate with other team members to ensure timely and efficient processing of repair requests.
Requirements:High school diploma or equivalent.Previous experience in endoscopy or medical device repair is highly desirable.Strong technical aptitude and the ability to quickly learn and understand complex systems.Excellent attention to detail and the ability to accurately assess equipment condition and repair needs.Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.Ability to work independently with minimal supervision as well as collaborate effectively with team members.Proficiency with computer systems and software applications.
Benefits:Competitive hourly pay rate ranging from $17 to $20 per hour.Full-time & Part-Time position with regular hours from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday through Friday.Opportunities for advancement and professional development.Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance and retirement savings plan.A dynamic and supportive work environment with a focus on teamwork and innovation.
If you are a motivated individual with a passion for precision and a desire to make a difference in the healthcare industry, we encourage you to apply for the Estimation Technician position at Endo Technologies, LLC. Join us in our mission to improve patient care through cutting-edge endoscopy solutions.To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and qualifications to SpencerJ@endoti.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

Experience Level (if available): None
